entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers or flurries. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
